Translations.Text: Alif Lam Mim Saad
A Book has been revealed to you. Let it cause no anxiety in your heart, as you will use it to warn and remind the believers
Follow what has been sent down to you by your Lord, and follow no masters other than Him. How seldom do you remember
So many [rebellious] towns have We destroyed. Our punishment came to them at night or while they were resting in the afternoon
Their only cry when Our punishment came to them was "How unjust we were
We will certainly question those to whom a message was sent, and We will certainly question the messengers
We know and will tell them in detail and knowledge, as We were never absent
On that Day, everyone's deeds will be weighed in the balance of Truth. Those whose good deeds weigh on the heavier side will be successful
whereas; those whose good deeds are on the lighter side will suffer loss because of their willful rejection of Our messages
We have given you a place on earth and appointed a means of livelihood for you, [yet] you are seldom grateful
We have created you and formed you, and then We said to the angels, "Bow down before Adam," at which point, they all bowed down except for Iblis: he was not among those who bowed down
[God] said, "What has stopped you from bowing down when I commanded you?" He answered, "I am better than him. You created me out of fire, but you only created him out of clay
[God] said, "Get down from here, you are not allowed to be arrogant in this place. Get out, you are disgraced
Iblis said, "Give me until the day they will be resurrected
[God] replied, "You will have the time you want
Iblis said, "Now that You have caused me to fall into this, I will sit for them on Your straight path
I will come at them openly as well as secretly, from their right and from their left and You will find that most of them are ungrateful
[God] said, "Get out of here, you disgraced and disowned! As for those who will follow you, I will definitely fill Hell with all of you
And Adam, you and your wife will live in this garden, and both of you eat whatever you may wish, but do not approach this one tree or you will become unjust
Then, Satan whispered to them to expose their nakedness, which had been hidden from them, and he said, "Your Lord has forbidden you this tree so that you do not become angels or immortal
He swore to them, "I am a sincere advisor

and he succeeded in deceiving them. As soon as the two had tasted [the fruit] of the tree, their nakedness became obvious to them, and they started covering themselves with leaves from the Garden.Their Lord called to them, "Did I not forbid that tree to you and tell you, 'Satan is your clear enemy
The two replied, "Lord, We have sinned against ourselves and unless You forgive us and have mercy on us, we will definitely be lost
God said, "You get down to earth, as enemies to one another. You will live and have your home there for a while
There you will live," He added, "and there you will die, and from it you will be brought forth [on Resurrection Day]

Children of Adam, We have sent down clothes to you to cover your nakedness and as a thing of beauty, but the garment of awareness of God is the best of all. These are blessings from God, so that you may remember

Children of Adam, do not allow Satan to seduce you in the same way he caused your ancestors to be driven out of the Garden. He deprived them of their garment [of God-consciousness] in order to make them aware of their nakedness. He and his tribe watch you from where you cannot see them. We have made satanic forces allies to those who do not believe

Whenever they commit a shameful deed, they say, "We found our forefathers doing it," and, "God has commanded us to do this." Say, "God does not command disgraceful deeds. How could you attribute something to God about which you have no knowledge
Say, "My Lord has commanded righteousness." Face Him, and direct your worship straight to Him. Call on Him, devoting yourself only to Him. Just as He first created you, so you will return
Some [of you] He graced with guidance, while, others are doomed to stray. They have taken devils for their masters instead of God, thinking all the while that they have found the right path
